Qui selezioni una missione e formi una compagnia di ventura di quattro eroi per intraprenderla. {colour_start|notable}Seleziona{colour_end} le missioni con lo {colour_start|notable}[STICK SINISTRO]{colour_end} o {colour_start|notable}[TOCCA]{colour_end} per vederne i dettagli. Colloca gli eroi negli slot in fondo alla schermata per scegliere i membri della tua compagnia tenendo premuto {colour_start|notable}[ZR]{colour_end} e usando {colour_start|notable}[A]{colour_end} o {colour_start|notable}[TRASCINA]{colour_end} sul touch screen.

Dovrai {colour_start|notable}reclutare tutti questi eroi{colour_end} per completare un gruppo di quattro. Seleziona ciascun eroe con {colour_start|notable}[STICK SINISTRO] più [A]{colour_end} e poi usa nuovamente {colour_start|notable}[STICK SINISTRO] più [A]{colour_end} per collocare l'eroe nella tua squadra attiva sulla destra. Oppure, con il touch screen: {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TRASCINALI]{colour_end} nella lista della squadra.

Dopo aver soddisfatto i requisiti di una missione, puoi scegliere di {colour_start|notable}ritornare al villaggio{colour_end} in qualsiasi momento, premendo lo {colour_start|notable}[STICK DESTRO]{colour_end} o semplicemente {colour_start|notable}[TOCCANDO] lo stemma{colour_end}. Non devi tornare alla stanza iniziale della segreta per uscire.
(Premi {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[B] o l'icona [x] in alto a destra{colour_end} per chiudere questa finestra.)

Quando un eroe è selezionato, premi{colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[Y]{colour_end} (sul touch screen {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOCCA DUE VOLTE]{colour_end} l'{colour_start|notable}immagine o il ritratto{colour_end} di un eroe) per accedere a un quadro dettagliato di tutte le {colour_start|notable}ossessioni{colour_end}, {colour_start|notable}abilità{colour_end} e {colour_start|notable}resistenze{colour_end} dell'eroe.

In qualsiasi schermata del gioco, premi {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[PULSANTE -]{colour_end} o {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOCCA]{colour_end} il {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[PULSANTE D'AIUTO]{colour_end} nel menu di pausa per visualizzare l'aiuto contestuale. Provalo nel villaggio o quando esplori, lotti, fai campeggio o altro.

Il combattimento si svolge {colour_start|notable}a turni{colour_end}. Quando tocca al tuo eroe, {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}seleziona{colour_end} un'icona dell'abilità (touch screen: {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOCCA]{colour_end} un'icona dell'abilità) e poi {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}seleziona{colour_end} ({colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOCCA]{colour_end}) un bersaglio. Se non puoi selezionare una determinata abilità, è perché quell'eroe deve {colour_start|notable}trovarsi in una posizione differente{colour_end} o {colour_start|notable}nessun bersaglio valido{colour_end} è disponibile. {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}Evidenzia{colour_end} ({colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOCCA]{colour_end}) l'abilità per vederne i requisiti.

Al momento sei in una {colour_start|notable}stanza{colour_end}.
Per raggiungerne un'altra, usa lo {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[STICK DESTRO]{colour_end} per selezionare una {colour_start|notable}stanza di arrivo{colour_end} sulla {colour_start|notable}mappa{colour_end} (oppure {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOCCALA]{colour_end}). Così facendo accederai al {colour_start|notable}corridoio di collegamento{colour_end}.
(Premi {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[B] o l'icona [x] in alto a destra{colour_end} per chiudere questa finestra.)

Quando ti trovi in un {colour_start|notable}corridoio{colour_end}, usa lo {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[STICK SINISTRO]{colour_end} (oppure {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOCCA DAVANTI O DIETRO AL GRUPPO]{colour_end}) per muoverti avanti o indietro.
(Premi {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[B] o l'icona [x] in alto a destra{colour_end} per chiudere questa finestra.)

Mentre esplori, incontrerai spesso {colour_start|notable}oggetti interattivi{colour_end}. Premi {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[A]{colour_end} per ispezionarli con l'eroe attivo (touch screen: {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOCCA L'OGGETTO]{colour_end}). Dai un'occhiata a questa tenda...
(Premi {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[B] o l'icona [x] in alto a destra{colour_end} per chiudere questa finestra.)

Il tuo eroe sta {colour_start|pop_text_bleed}sanguinando{colour_end}!
Se lo desideri, puoi usare una {colour_start|notable}benda{colour_end} nell'inventario per tamponare il sanguinamento. Seleziona una benda e premi {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[X]{colour_end} (touch screen: {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOCCA DUE VOLTE]{colour_end} la {colour_start|notable}benda{colour_end}) per usarla quando è il turno dell'eroe ferito.

Seleziona e usa antidoti, bende o erbe medicinali nell'inventario con lo {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[STICK SINISTRO]{colour_end} e {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[X]{colour_end} per curare rispettivamente INFEZIONI, EMORRAGIE o MORBI sull'eroe selezionato. Puoi anche {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOCCARE DUE VOLTE]{colour_end} questi oggetti nell'inventario.

La {colour_start|notable}luce{colour_end} si sta affievolendo! L'attuale {colour_start|notable}livello delle torce influenza enormemente molte meccaniche{colour_end} del gioco. Più fa buio, più le situazioni si complicano e le ricompense diventano maggiori. Seleziona una torcia nell'inventario e premi {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[X]{colour_end} per consumarla e ripristinare il livello di luce. Sul touch screen: {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOCCA DUE VOLTE]{colour_end} la torcia nel tuo inventario o in alto sullo schermo.

In questa missione dovrai fare {colour_start|notable}campeggio{colour_end} e ciò richiede {colour_start|notable}legna da ardere{colour_end}. Quest'ultima ti verrà {colour_start|notable}automaticamente assegnata{colour_end} in missioni specifiche.
Il {colour_start|notable}campeggio{colour_end} offre agli eroi l'opportunità di {colour_start|notable}tirare il fiato all'interno della segreta{colour_end}. Quando sei ferito o stressato e hai bisogno di fare campeggio, seleziona (o {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOCCA DUE VOLTE]{colour_end}) la legna da ardere nel tuo inventario e premi {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[X]{colour_end}.

Le {colour_start|trap}trappole{colour_end} localizzate saranno {colour_start|notable}visibili sul terreno{colour_end} quando ti ci avvicini. Seleziona un eroe e premi {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[A]{colour_end} in prossimità della {colour_start|trap}trappola{colour_end} (o {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOCCA]{colour_end} la trappola) per tentare di {colour_start|notable}disinnescarla{colour_end}. Quando gli eroi entrano nel raggio di una trappola scoperta, l'icona della trappola apparirà nelle loro barre di stato. Alcuni eroi sono più bravi a disinnescare di altri.

Per aprire una {colour_start|notable}porta{colour_end}, premi {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[A]{colour_end} quando ce l'hai di fronte (oppure {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOCCA]{colour_end} la porta).

Ogni eroe dispone di due slot per equipaggiare altrettanti oggetti, chiamati {colour_start|notable}accessori{colour_end}. Selezionane uno nell'inventario e premi {colour_start|notable}[A]{colour_end} per equipaggiarlo. Gli {colour_start|notable}accessori{colour_end} sono equi: hanno pregi ma anche difetti, e alcuni sono riservati a una specifica classe di eroi. Con il touch screen: {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TRASCINA]{colour_end} gli accessori dalla scheda personaggio all'inventario degli accessori e viceversa.

Puoi rivendere gli accessori indesiderati nel tuo inventario degli accessori e ricavarci qualche quattrino. Apri l'inventario degli accessori con {colour_start|notable}[X]{colour_end}, seleziona quello che non vuoi più e vendilo con [Y]. Con il touch screen: {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TIENI PREMUTO]{colour_end} per accedere alle opzioni di vendita.

Una perlustrazione eseguita alla perfezione può svelare a volte una {colour_start|notable}stanza segreta{colour_end}! Vai sulla casella contrassegnata da una stella e premi {colour_start|notable}[A]{colour_end} (touch screen: {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOCCA]{colour_end} il muro) per entrare. Coloro che portano con sé una {colour_start|notable}chiave{colour_end} rimarranno abbagliati dai tesori che contiene...

Seleziona un eroe con {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[ZR più STICK SINISTRO]{colour_end} e poi premi {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[Y]{colour_end} per esaminare la scheda del personaggio (touch screen:{colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOCCA DUE VOLTE]{colour_end} un eroe). Da qui puoi selezionare abilità e cambiare il colore dei vestiti, il suo nome o congedarlo in pianta stabile.

Usa {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[STICK SINISTRO e A]{colour_end} per entrare negli edifici. Su touch screen: {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOCCA]{colour_end} un edificio.
DILIGENZA: recluta nuovi eroi.
FUCINA, GILDA, SOPRAVVITORIO: potenzia abilità ed equipaggiamento degli eroi.
TAVERNA, ABBAZIA: manda eroi per alleviare lo {colour_start|stressNOT1}stress{colour_end}.
FRENOCOMIO: cura malattie e ossessioni dell'eroe.
CARRO DEI NOMADI: acquista oggetti rari.

Premi lo {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[STICK DESTRO]{colour_end} quando te la senti di {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}INTRAPRENDERE una missione{colour_end}. Con il touch screen: {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOCCA]{colour_end} INTRAPRENDI.

Quando un eroe è selezionato, premi {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[Y]{colour_end} per esaminarlo. Touch screen: {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOCCA DUE VOLTE]{colour_end} l'eroe.

Usa {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[A]{colour_end} per ingaggiare e collocare nuovi eroi nella tua squadra. Touch screen: {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TRASCINALI]{colour_end} nella lista della squadra.

Tieni premuto {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[ZL]{colour_end} per accedere ai potenziamenti di questo edificio. Touch screen: {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOCCA]{colour_end} l'icona croce.

Touch screen: {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOCCA]{colour_end} i potenziamenti. Potresti dover potenziare la Gilda prima di acquistare determinati potenziamenti per un eroe.

Tieni premuto {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[ZL]{colour_end} per accedere ai potenziamenti di questo edificio. Touch screen: {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOCCA]{colour_end} l'icona croce.

{colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}Colloca{colour_end} un eroe della tua squadra nel Sopravvitorio per vedere le opzioni di potenziamento delle abilità di campeggio. {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}Colloca{colour_end} un eroe della tua squadra nello slot appropriato e conferma il pagamento con {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[A]{colour_end} per iniziare un'attività per alleviare lo stress.

Completa le missioni nelle regioni per incrementare il tuo dominio su quella regione e sbloccare nuove tipologie di missioni.

Premi lo {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[STICK DESTRO]{colour_end} (oppure {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOCCA]{colour_end} VETTOVAGLIAMENTO) quando te la senti di procedere al vettovagliamento.

{colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}Seleziona{colour_end} oggetti nel negozio e premi {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[A]{colour_end} per acquistarli (oppure {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOCCA]{colour_end} gli oggetti per acquistarli) in vista della spedizione.
A fine missione, le provviste non utilizzate verranno scartate e non riceverai rimborso alcuno. Compra lo stretto necessario!
Porta sempre con te del cibo e delle torce! Ogni eroe consuma di norma 1 unità di cibo a pasto (evento campeggio o carestia) e anche nelle missioni più brevi almeno 8 torce sono indispensabili.

Usa lo {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[STICK DESTRO]{colour_end} (oppure {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOCCA]{colour_end} una stanza) per scegliere una nuova stanza di arrivo ed entrare nel corridoio di collegamento.
Usa {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[R e L]{colour_end} per cambiare l'eroe attivo. Oppure {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOCCA]{colour_end} l'eroe.

Premi {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[SU e GIÙ]{colour_end} per muoverti tra INVENTARIO e MAPPA. Oppure {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOCCA]{colour_end} le schede INVENTARIO o MAPPA.

Premi {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[A]{colour_end} per spostare un eroe all'interno della compagnia. {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[Tieni premuto A]{colour_end} per ripristinare l'ordine predefinito. Puoi anche {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOCCARE]{colour_end} l'abilità Spostamento di un eroe.

Per iniziare un CAMPEGGIO, seleziona la legna da ardere nell'inventario (se ne hai un po') e premi {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[X]{colour_end}. Puoi anche {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOCCARE DUE VOLTE]{colour_end} la legna da ardere.

Tieni premuto {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[ZL]{colour_end} per visualizzare gli effetti di gioco come livello di luce e condizioni dello stato dell'eroe. Puoi anche {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOCCARE]{colour_end} la torcia.

Premi lo {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[STICK DESTRO]{colour_end} per abbandonare la missione e tornare al borgo. Oppure {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOCCA]{colour_end} l'icona della ritirata (a forma di "X").

La tua compagnia ha {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[12 PUNTI TREGUA]{colour_end} da spendere per usare abilità di campeggio.

Usa {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[L e R]{colour_end} per selezionare un eroe (oppure {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOCCA]{colour_end} un eroe) e poi {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[STICK SINISTRO e A]{colour_end} per usare un'abilità. In Darkest Dungeon dovrai sopravvivere a situazioni terribili. Alcune missioni falliranno o verranno abbandonate, moriranno eroi (e rimarranno defunti). I progressi vengono salvati in automatico di frequente, quindi le tue azioni sono permanenti.

Nelle segrete occorre tenere premuto il pulsante ZL per scambiare la posizione dell'eroe, modificare la selezione dell'eroe o visualizzare la scheda personaggio. Abilita questa opzione se ti capita spesso di scambiare inavvertitamente la posizione di un eroe.
x
Mentre esplori le segrete, usa i pulsanti destra e sinistra della pulsantiera di comando + per scambiare gli eroi invece dei pulsanti L o ZL.
Interagisci muovendo in su lo stick sinistro.
Nelle segrete, muovi lo stick sinistro in su per entrare nelle porte, aprire rarità e compiere azioni simili (stessa funzionalità del pulsante A).
Premi [PUSLANTE −] per visualizzare l'aiuto contestuale.
[TOCCA DUE VOLTE] il ritratto dell'eroe per visualizzare la scheda personaggio.
[TOCCA] il pulsante sopra la squadra per ordinare gli eroi.
Tocca due volte per invertire l'ordine.
[TOCCA DIETRO AL GRUPPO] per spostarti a sinistra.
[TOCCA DAVANTI AL GRUPPO] per spostarti a destra.
[TOCCA DUE VOLTE] l'eroe per visualizzare la scheda personaggio.
[TOCCA DUE VOLTE] il simbolo della luce per usare la torcia.
[SCORRI VERSO IL BASSO] sul simbolo della luce per diminuire la luce.

Al momento il villaggio non ha molto da offrire. È ora di INTRAPRENDERE una missione!

Ogni oggetto, se lo prendi, occuperà spazio nel tuo inventario.

Funziona anche nell'inventario! (Touch screen: {colour_start|notable}[TOCCA]{colour_end} l'oggetto).
(Premi {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[B] o l'icona [x] in alto a destra{colour_end} per chiudere questa finestra.)
Gli eroi possono avere solo {colour_start|notable}4 abilità di campeggio attive{colour_end} alla volta. Toccale per attivarle o disattivarle.

Visto che sei qui, cogli l'occasione per {colour_start|notable}potenziare la rete della Diligenza{colour_end} spendendo alcuni dei tuoi cimeli di partenza. Così facendo aumenterai il numero di eroi disponibili qui in futuro.
Tieni premuto {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[ZL]{colour_end} e seleziona il potenziamento con {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[STICK SINISTRO] e [A]{colour_end}, oppure {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOCCA]{colour_end} il simbolo {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[+]{colour_end} a sinistra e poi {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOCCA]{colour_end} il potenziamento.
Per scorrere una lista in su e in giù, [TOCCA E TIENI PREMUTA] l'area della lista sullo schermo con [DUE DITA] e poi [TRASCINA] per SCORRERE la lista.

这是你选择任务并让四名英雄组队开始探险的地方。 使用{colour_start|notable}[L 摇杆]{colour_end}或{colour_start|notable}[点击]{colour_end}来{colour_start|notable}[选择]{colour_end}任务以查看任务详情。 按住{colour_start|notable}[ZR 键]{colour_end}并使用{colour_start|notable}[A 键]{colour_end}，或在触屏上{colour_start|notable}[拖拽]{colour_end}可将英雄放置于屏幕底部的栏位中，组成你的队伍。

《极暗地牢》是一款在绝境中全力以赴的游戏。任务可能会失败，或是必须放弃。英雄们会阵亡。且当他们一旦死去，就永远离去了。游戏进度会自动保存，因此所有操作都无法撤回。
在地牢中交换英雄位置，选择英雄或查看人物信息之前，都需按住ZL 键。如果你经常无意中交换英雄位置，可将此选项开启。
x

セーブして終了
ダーケストダンジョンは、悪状況を最大限に楽しむゲームだ。クエストは失敗する。あるいは途中放棄を余儀なくされる。ヒーローは死ぬ。死んだ者は復活しない。ゲームプレイは細かく自動セーブされるため、すべての行為が記録に残る。
ダンジョンではZLボタン長押しによって、ヒーローの位置の入れ替え、ヒーロー選択の変更、キャラクターシートの確認ができる。意図せずヒーローの位置が頻繁に入れ替わるようなら、これをオンにせよ。
x

左スティックを上に入力して調べる
ダンジョンでは、左スティックを上げることで、扉をくぐったりキュリオを開けたりといった動作が可能だ（Aボタンの機能と重複）

저장하고 종료
Darkest Dungeon의 핵심은 악조건을 최대한 극복하는 것입니다. 퀘스트에 실패하거나 포기하는 경우를 각오해야 하며, 영웅도 자칫하면 죽어 나갑니다. 게다가 죽은 영웅은 되살릴 수 없습니다. 진행 상황은 빈번하게 저장되므로 선택을 돌이킬 수 없습니다.
던전에 있는 동안, ZL 버튼을 길게 눌러야 영웅의 위치를 변경하거나, 선택한 영웅을 변경하거나, 캐릭터 시트를 확인할 수 있습니다. 의도치 않게 영웅의 위치가 자주 변경된다면 이 기능을 켜십시오.

저장 후 종료
Darkest Dungeon은 상상할 수 있는 모든 최악의 상황을 구현한 게임입니다. 원정은 끊임없이 실패하고 퇴각해야 할 것이며, 영웅들 역시 계속 죽어 나갈 것입니다. 한 번 죽은 이는 되살릴 수 없습니다. 진행 상황은 꾸준히 자동 저장되므로, 선택 하나하나가 영구적인 영향을 미칩니다.
던전에서 영웅의 위치를 변경하거나, 다른 영웅을 선택하거나, 캐릭터 창을 보려면 ZL 버튼을 누른 상태여야 합니다. 원치 않게 계속 영웅의 위치를 바꾸는 일이 발생한다면 이 설정을 활성화해주세요.
x
던전에서 이동 중에 L 버튼이나 ZL 버튼 대신 +컨트롤 패드 왼쪽 혹은 오른쪽으로 영웅을 전환합니다.
L 스틱을 올려 상호작용
던전에서 왼쪽 스틱을 위로하여 문을 열거나, 골동품 수집 등의 상호작용을 할 수 있습니다. (A 버튼의 기능과 동일합니다.)
[-버튼]을 눌러 상황에 맞는 도움말 표시
영웅의 초상화를 [더블탭]하여 캐릭터 창을 확인합니다.
명단의 순서 버튼을 [탭]하여 영웅들을 정렬합니다.
두 번 정렬하면 역순으로 나열합니다
[원정대 뒤를 터치] - 왼쪽으로 이동
[원정대 앞을 터치] - 오른쪽으로 이동
영웅을 [더블탭]하여 캐릭터 창을 확인합니다.
상단 횃불 아이콘을 [더블탭]하여 횃불을 사용합니다.
상단 횃불 아이콘을 [아래로 스와이프]하여 어둡게 합니다.
지금은 이 마을에서 할 수 있는 일이 많지 않습니다. 원정을 위해 출정할 시간입니다! {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[오른쪽 스틱]{colour_end}이나 화면 하단의 {colour_start|notable}[출정]{colour_end} 버튼을 누르세요!

각 아이템은 입수한 후 가방의 공간을 차지합니다. {colour_start|notable}[ZL 버튼]{colour_end}을 누르거나 {colour_start|notable}[길게 터치]{colour_end}하면 세부 정보가 표시됩니다. 또한, 소지품 창에서도 동일한 방법으로 확인할 수 있습니다.{colour_start|notable}{colour_end}({colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[B 버튼]이나 상단의 X 아이콘{colour_end}을 누르면 창을 닫습니다.)
각 영웅들은 {colour_start|notable}한번에 4개의 야영 기술{colour_end}을 장비할 수 있습니다. 각 기술을 터치하여 켜고 끌 수 있습니다.

마을에 있는 동안, 모아온 가보를 사용해 {colour_start|notable}역마차 교통망을 확충{colour_end}하십시오. 이후 매주마다 고용할 수 있는 영웅의 숫자가 늘어날 것입니다. 확충하려면 {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[ZL 버튼]{colour_end}을 길게 눌러 목록을 표시한 다음 {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[왼쪽 스틱]과 [A 버튼]{colour_end}으로 선택하십시오. 왼쪽의 {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[+]{colour_end} 심볼을 {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}터치{colour_end}하여 목록을 표시한 다음, {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}터치{colour_end}로 확충할 수도 있습니다.
목록을 위 아래로 스크롤하려면, {colour_start|notable}[두 손가락]{colour_end}으로 화면을 {colour_start|notable}[길게 터치]{colour_end}한 뒤 {colour_start|notable}[드래그]{colour_end}하세요.

This is where you select a quest and form an adventuring party of four heroes to embark on it. {colour_start|notable}Select{colour_end} quests with {colour_start|notable}[LEFT STICK]{colour_end} or {colour_start|notable}[TOUCH]{colour_end} to see their details. Place heroes into slots at the bottom of the screen to form your party by holding {colour_start|notable}[ZR Button]{colour_end} and using the {colour_start|notable}[A BUTTON]{colour_end} or {colour_start|notable}[DRAG]{colour_end} on the touch screen.

You'll need to {colour_start|notable}recruit all of these heroes{colour_end} to fill out a party of four. Select each hero with {colour_start|notable}[LEFT STICK] plus [A BUTTON]{colour_end} and then use {colour_start|notable}[LEFT STICK] plus [A BUTTON]{colour_end} again to place the hero in your active roster on the right. Or with touch screen: {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[DRAG]{colour_end} them into the Roster list.

After you've completed the requirements of a quest, you have the option to {colour_start|notable}return to town{colour_end} at any time--just press {colour_start|notable}[RIGHT STICK]{colour_end} or just {colour_start|notable}[TOUCH] the crest{colour_end}. You don't need to return to the starting room of the dungeon to exit. (Press {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[B BUTTON] or the top right cross [x] icon{colour_end} to close this window.)

When a hero is selected, press {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[Y BUTTON]{colour_end} (on the touch screen {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[DOUBLE-TAP]{colour_end} on a hero's {colour_start|notable}image or portrait{colour_end}) to bring up a detailed panel showing all of the hero's {colour_start|notable}quirks{colour_end}, {colour_start|notable}skills{colour_end}, and {colour_start|notable}resistances{colour_end}.

On any screen in the game, press {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[- BUTTON]{colour_end} or {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOUCH]{colour_end} the {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[HELP BUTTON]{colour_end} in the pause menu to see contextual help. Try it while in town, exploring, fighting, camping, and more.

Combat is {colour_start|notable}turn-based{colour_end}. On your hero's turn, {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}Select{colour_end} a skill icon (touch screen: {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOUCH]{colour_end} a skill icon) and then {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}Select{colour_end} ({colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOUCH]{colour_end}) a target. If you can't select a particular skill, it's because that hero needs to be {colour_start|notable}standing in a different spot{colour_end} or there are {colour_start|notable}no valid targets{colour_end}. {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}Highlight{colour_end} ({colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOUCH]{colour_end}) the skill to see the requirements.

You are currently in a {colour_start|notable}room{colour_end}. To move towards another room, use {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[RIGHT STICK]{colour_end} to select a {colour_start|notable}destination room{colour_end} on the {colour_start|notable}map{colour_end} (or {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOUCH]{colour_end} it). This will take you to the {colour_start|notable}connecting hallway{colour_end}. (Press {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[B BUTTON] or the top right cross [x] icon{colour_end} to close this window.)

While in a {colour_start|notable}hallway{colour_end}, use {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[LEFT STICK]{colour_end} (or {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOUCH AHEAD OF OR BEHIND THE PARTY]{colour_end}) to move forward or backward. (Press {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[B BUTTON] or the top right cross [x] icon{colour_end} to close this window.)

While exploring, you will often find {colour_start|notable}interactive objects{colour_end}. Press {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[A BUTTON]{colour_end} to investigate them with the active hero (touch screen: {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOUCH THE OBJECT]{colour_end}). Take a look at this tent... (Press {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[B BUTTON] or the top right cross [x] icon{colour_end} to close this window.)

Your hero is {colour_start|pop_text_bleed}bleeding{colour_end}! If you wish, you can use a {colour_start|notable}bandage{colour_end} from inventory to stop the flow. Select the bandage and press {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[X BUTTON]{colour_end} (touch screen: {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[DOUBLE-TAP]{colour_end} on the {colour_start|notable}bandage{colour_end}) to use it when it's the injured hero's turn.

Select and use Anti-Venom, Bandages, or Medicinal Herbs from inventory with {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[LEFT STICK]{colour_end} and {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[X BUTTON]{colour_end} to heal BLIGHT, BLEED, or DEBUFFS on the current hero, respectively. You can also {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[DOUBLE-TAP]{colour_end} these items in the inventory.

The {colour_start|notable}light{colour_end} is fading! The current {colour_start|notable}torch level greatly affects many mechanics{colour_end} in the game. The darker it gets, the harder things get but the better the rewards. Select a torch in inventory and press {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[X BUTTON]{colour_end} to consume it and boost the light back up. On touch screen: {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[DOUBLE-TAP]{colour_end} the torch in your inventory or at the torch at the top of the screen.

This quest involves {colour_start|notable}Camping{colour_end} and Camping requires {colour_start|notable}firewood{colour_end}. Firewood is {colour_start|notable}given automatically{colour_end} to you on appropriate quests. {colour_start|notable}Camping{colour_end} gives heroes a chance to {colour_start|notable}recuperate while in the dungeon{colour_end}. When you are wounded or stressed and wish to camp, select firewood (or {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[DOUBLE-TAP]{colour_end} it) in your inventory and press {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[X BUTTON]{colour_end}.

Scouted {colour_start|trap}traps{colour_end} will be {colour_start|notable}visible on the ground{colour_end} as you approach them. Select a hero and then press {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[A BUTTON]{colour_end} while near the {colour_start|trap}trap{colour_end} (or {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOUCH]{colour_end} the trap) to attempt to {colour_start|notable}disarm it{colour_end}. When heroes are within range of a scouted trap, the trap icon will show up in their status bars. Some heroes are better than others at disarming.

To enter a {colour_start|notable}door{colour_end}, press {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[A BUTTON]{colour_end} when standing in front of it (or {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result} [TOUCH]{colour_end} the door).

Each hero has slots to equip two items, called {colour_start|notable}trinkets{colour_end}. Just select the trinket in the inventory and press {colour_start|notable}[A BUTTON] {colour_end} to equip it. {colour_start|notable}Trinkets{colour_end} generally have a trade-off: something good, something bad. Some are also restricted to one hero class. With touch screen: {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[DRAG]{colour_end} trinkets back and forth from the character sheet to the Trinket Inventory.

You can sell back unwanted trinkets from your Trinket Inventory and make some money. Open the Trinket Inventory with {colour_start|notable}[X BUTTON]{colour_end}, select a trinket you don't want, and then sell it with [Y BUTTON]. With touch screen: {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[LONG TOUCH]{colour_end} to bring up selling options.

A critical scouting success will sometimes reveal a {colour_start|notable}Secret Room{colour_end}! Advance to the tile marked with a star, and press {colour_start|notable}[A BUTTON]{colour_end} (touch screen: {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result} [TOUCH]{colour_end} the wall) to enter. Fabulous wealth and riches await those equipped with a {colour_start|notable}key{colour_end}...

Select a hero with {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[ZR Button plus LEFT STICK]{colour_end} and then press {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[Y BUTTON]{colour_end} to inspect their character sheet (touch screen: {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[DOUBLE-TAP]{colour_end} on a hero) . Skills can be selected, clothing color can be changed, and they can be renamed or dismissed permanently.

Use {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[L STICK and A BUTTON]{colour_end} to enter buildings. On touch screen: {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOUCH]{colour_end} a building.
STAGECOACH: recruit new heroes
BLACKSMITH, GUILD, SURVIVALIST: upgrade hero skills and equipment
TAVERN, ABBEY: send heroes for {colour_start|stressNOT1}stress{colour_end} relief
SANITARIUM: treat heroes' quirks and diseases
NOMAD'S WAGON: purchase rare items

Press {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[RIGHT STICK]{colour_end} when ready to {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}EMBARK on a quest{colour_end}. With touch screen: {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOUCH]{colour_end} on EMBARK.

Hold {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[ZL Button]{colour_end} to access upgrades for this building. Touch screen: {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOUCH]{colour_end} the cross icon.

With a hero selected, press {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[Y BUTTON]{colour_end} to inspect them. Touch screen: {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[DOUBLE-TAP]{colour_end} the hero.

Use {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[A BUTTON]{colour_end} to hire and place new heroes into your roster. Or with touch screen: {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[DRAG]{colour_end} them into the Roster list.

Hold {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[ZL Button]{colour_end} to access upgrades for this building. Touch screen: {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOUCH]{colour_end} the cross icon.

{colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}Place{colour_end} a hero from your roster into the Blacksmith slot to see their weapon and armor upgrade options. Touch screen: {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOUCH]{colour_end} on a hero in your roster to load them.

{colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}Select{colour_end} upgrades and press {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[A BUTTON]{colour_end} to purchase them. {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}Select{colour_end} available quests to inspect them. Touch screen: {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOUCH]{colour_end} the quest.

{colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}Select{colour_end} heroes and press {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[A BUTTON]{colour_end} to add them into the adventuring party. Touch screen: {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOUCH]{colour_end} on heroes or {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[DRAG] {colour_end} them into the party slots.
Heroes that are in the Tavern, Abbey, or Sanitarium will be unavailable for use.
Complete quests in regions to advance your Mastery in that region and open up new quest types.

Press {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[RIGHT STICK]{colour_end} (or {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOUCH]{colour_end} PROVISION) when ready to proceed to Provisioning.

{colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}Select{colour_end} items in the shop and press {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[A BUTTON]{colour_end} to purchase them (or {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOUCH]{colour_end} items to buy) for the expedition.
At quest end, unused provisions will be discarded without repayment. Buy only as much as you need!
You'll always want to carry some food and torches! Each hero generally eats 1 food unit per meal (Camping or Hunger event) and even on short quests you'll want at least 8 torches.

Use {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[RIGHT STICK]{colour_end} to choose a new room destination (or {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOUCH]{colour_end} on a room) and enter the connecting hallway.
Use {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[R Button and L Button]{colour_end} to change active hero. Or {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOUCH]{colour_end} the hero instead.

Use {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[UP BUTTON and DOWN BUTTON]{colour_end} to toggle between INVENTORY and MAP. Or {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOUCH]{colour_end} the INVENTORY or MAP tabs.

Press {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[A BUTTON]{colour_end} to move a hero within the party. {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[Hold A BUTTON]{colour_end} to restore default order. You can also {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOUCH]{colour_end} on a hero's move skill.

To start CAMPING, select firewood in inventory (if you have any) and press {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[X BUTTON]{colour_end}. You can also {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[DOUBLE-TAP]{colour_end} the firewood.

Hold {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[ZL Button]{colour_end} to view gameplay effects like light level and hero status conditions. You can also {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOUCH]{colour_end} the torch.

Press {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[RIGHT STICK]{colour_end} to abandon the quest and return to the Hamlet. Or {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOUCH]{colour_end} the retreat icon (looks like an "X").

Hold {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[ZR Button]{colour_end} to access map controls. On the touch screen: {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[PINCH]{colour_end} to zoom the map or {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[DRAG]{colour_end} to pan it.

Press {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[Y BUTTON]{colour_end} to see a hero's detailed character sheet. Or {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[DOUBLE-TAP]{colour_end} the hero.

While in a {colour_start|notable}hallway{colour_end}, use {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[LEFT STICK]{colour_end} (or ,{colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result} [TOUCH AHEAD OF THE PARTY]{colour_end}) to move forward or backward (touch screen: {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result} [TOUCH BEHIND THE PARTY]{colour_end}).
Press {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[A BUTTON]{colour_end} to enter doors. Or {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOUCH]{colour_end} the door/above it.

Use {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[UP BUTTON and DOWN BUTTON]{colour_end} to toggle between INVENTORY and MAP. Or {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOUCH]{colour_end} the INVENTORY or MAP tabs.
Use {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[R Button and L Button]{colour_end} to change hero selection. Or {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOUCH]{colour_end} the hero.

Press {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[A BUTTON]{colour_end} to move a hero within the party. {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[Hold A BUTTON]{colour_end} to restore default order. You can also {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOUCH]{colour_end} on a hero's move skill.

Hold {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[ZL Button]{colour_end} to view gameplay effects like light level and hero status conditions. You can also {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TAP]{colour_end} on the torch.

Hold {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[ZR Button]{colour_end} to access map controls. On the touch screen: {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[PINCH]{colour_end} to zoom the map or {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[DRAG]{colour_end} to pan it.

Press {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[RIGHT STICK]{colour_end} to abandon the quest and return to the Hamlet. Or {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOUCH]{colour_end} the retreat icon (looks like an "X").

On your hero's turn, {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}Select{colour_end} a skill icon (touch screen: {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOUCH]{colour_end} a skill icon) and then {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}Select{colour_end} ({colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOUCH]{colour_end}) a target.

Each skill has requirements for where the hero needs to be standing and what enemies they can target. Select a skill (or {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOUCH]{colour_end} it) with {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[LEFT STICK]{colour_end} to see the requirements.

When selecting a target with {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[LEFT STICK]{colour_end}, you can see that enemy's stats and the hero's chance to hit / damage values with the currently selected skill. You can also {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[LONG TOUCH]{colour_end} an enemy to do this.

Press {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[Y BUTTON]{colour_end} to see a hero's detailed character sheet. Or {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[DOUBLE-TAP]{colour_end} the hero.

Press {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[RIGHT STICK]{colour_end} to attempt to retreat from the combat. Or {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOUCH]{colour_end} the retreat icon (looks like an "X").

Hold {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[ZL Button]{colour_end} to view gameplay effects like light level and hero status conditions. You can also {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOUCH]{colour_end} the torch.

Select and use Anti-Venom, Bandages, or Medicinal Herbs from inventory with {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[LEFT STICK]{colour_end} and {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[X BUTTON]{colour_end} to heal BLIGHT, BLEED, or DEBUFFS on the current hero, respectively. You can also {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[DOUBLE-TAP]{colour_end} these items in the inventory.

Use {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[LEFT STICK]{colour_end} to highlight a meal option and press {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[A BUTTON]{colour_end} to eat. You are limited by how much food you have in inventory. You can also just {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOUCH]{colour_end} the food.
Your party has {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[12 RESPITE POINTS]{colour_end} to spend on using Camping skills.

Use {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[L BUTTON plus R BUTTON]{colour_end} to select a hero (or {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOUCH]{colour_end} a hero) and then {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[LEFT STICK and A BUTTON]{colour_end} to use a skill. Some skills require a target to be selected. Skills and targets can be selected via {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOUCH]{colour_end} as well.

When done spending RESPITE POINTS, press {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[X BUTTON]{colour_end} to finish camping. On touch screen: {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOUCH]{colour_end} REST.
Use {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[RIGHT STICK]{colour_end} or {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOUCH]{colour_end} to select a destination room on the map.
Hold [ZL Button] and press [B BUTTON] to reduce torchlight. Touch screen: [SWIPE DOWN] on the torch.
Hold [ZL Button] and press [B BUTTON] repeatedly to snuff out the torch. Touch screen: {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result} [SWIPE DOWN] repeatedly on the torch. {colour_end}

Save and Exit

Darkest Dungeon is about making the most of a bad situation. Quests will fail or must be abandoned. Heroes will die. And when they die, they stay dead. Progress autosaves frequently, so actions are permanent.

While in dungeons, holding ZL Button is required before you can swap hero positions, change hero selection, or view character sheets. Turn this on if you frequently start swapping a hero's position when you didn't intend to.
x
While walking in dungeons, use +Control Pad Left and +Control Pad Right for hero swapping instead of L Button or ZL Button.
Interact with L Stick Up
While in dungeons, pressing up on L Stick can be used to enter doors, open curios, and similar actions. (This duplicates A Button functionality.)
Press [-BUTTON] for contextual help
[DOUBLE-TAP] hero portrait to view hero character sheet
[TAP] order button over roster to sort heroes
Sort twice to invert order
[TOUCH BEHIND THE PARTY] - Move Left
[TOUCH AHEAD THE PARTY] - Move right
[DOUBLE-TAP] hero to view hero character sheet
[DOUBLE-TAP] the light indicator to use torch.
[SWIPE DOWN] the light indicator to lower light.

There isn't much more you can do in town right now. It's time to EMBARK on a quest! Press {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[RIGHT STICK]{colour_end} or tap on the {colour_start|notable}[EMBARK]{colour_end} button at the bottom of the screen!

Each item, if you take it, will occupy space in your inventory. Hold {colour_start|notable}[ZL BUTTON]{colour_end} or {colour_start|notable}[TOUCH AND HOLD]{colour_end} loot items to show details about them. You can examine items in your inventory, too! (touch screen: {colour_start|notable}[TAP]{colour_end} on the item.) (Press {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[B BUTTON] or the top right cross [x] icon{colour_end} to close this window.)
Heroes can only have {colour_start|notable}4 Camping skills active{colour_end} at a time. Toggle the skills on and off by touching on them.

While you're here, spend some of your starting heirlooms on {colour_start|notable}upgrading the Stagecoach Network{colour_end}. This will increase the number of heroes available here in the future. Hold {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[ZL BUTTON]{colour_end} and select the upgrade with {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[LEFT STICK] and [A BUTTON]{colour_end}, or {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}TOUCH{colour_end} the {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[+]{colour_end} symbol on the left and then {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}TOUCH{colour_end} the upgrade.

To scroll up and down through lists, {colour_start|notable}[TOUCH AND HOLD]{colour_end} the screen area with the list with {colour_start|notable}[TWO FINGERS]{colour_end} and then {colour_start|notable}[DRAG]{colour_end} to SCROLL through the list.
